alert.message: Average CPU load is above acceptable average
alert.name: CPU load alert

panels.description: Used memory is "total usable memory" minus "available memory". (Available memory is the sum of free, buffer, cache, and other reclaimable memory.) Cache memory used by file systems and processes are not included in "used memory".
panels.title: Used RAM

panels.description: Used memory is "total usable memory" minus "available memory". (Available memory is the sum of free, buffer, cache, and other reclaimable memory.) Cache memory used by file systems and processes are not included in "used memory".
